description: Numbers that are congruent to {0, 3, 5} mod 6.
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..5000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (1,0,1,-1).
prog: (MAGMA) I:=[0, 3, 5, 6]; [n le 4 select I[n] else Self(n-1)+Self(n-3)-Self(n-4): n in [1..70]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Apr 26 2012
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
